column1: hints of swing back in from length on middle, deflects off the thigh pad to square leg. Beaten for pace first up
skiddly length ball on middle, this one nips back in, tucked to midwicket. 136kph
risky single. Tapped to Jadhav at square leg as they scampered through. Direct hit wouldn't have mattered as Lewis was just in. The fielder was slightly late to move to his right that time
hops back and across to punch the length ball on middle to mid-on
uses the depth of the crease to bunt this one to the short cover region
short of length down leg, helped to fine leg. Didn't get hold of it as much as he would've liked.
shapes to cut, no timing whatsoever. Chopped to the man coming in from point as they scamper through
poor ball. Errs in line this time. Slides a short of length delivery down leg, Hope tickles it fine. No chance for fine leg. Got enough bat on it. Easy pickings
too short outside off, he rocks back and frees his arms to flay this behind point. Dinesh Karthik with a sliding stop at square third man. Full-length dive across the turf
risky. Hops across to whip this to square leg. This one kept a touch low. Would've been plumb in front had he missed it
sprays this way outside off at length. Perhaps slipped out of his hand. Stiff breeze across the ground may have played its part
gets on top of the bounce and defends this towards point
hint of away movement from length outside off, left alone
floats this full on off stump, driven to mid-off
angles a back of length delivery across the left-hander who defends firmly off the backfoot
width and punished. Punched into the gap between cover and point. Slow outfield aids Jadeja who sprints behind that to pull it back in. Lovely timing
whips this full delivery from off stump towards mid-on
back of length outside off, not much movement this time, watched through to Dhoni
full and straight on off, drives but gets a thick inside edge towards mid-on
hint of away movement off the deck from length on middle, defended firmly
nips this away from short of length area on middle, once again Lewis hops back and across to defend this with a straight bat
short on leg stump, pulled to Dinesh Karthik at fine leg
beauty! This one's much fuller, swerves back in late to beat the inside-edge as he looked to work this across the line. No feet movement whatsoever

works this wide of midwicket as they complete a quick single. Was off the blocks in a jiffy. Kuldeep with a direct hit. They went upstairs to check if his foot was grounded when the stumps were broken. It was
shows the full face of the bat to defend that away-going delivery
change of ends, but no change of direction. Another poor ball: short and wide outside off, Hope uses the width to flay this in front of point. In complete control
this one nipped away late, Hope looked to work it to the leg side but got it on the outer half of the bat as it rolled to cover

delightful timing, even better placement. The outfield may be slow but it would've needed a superhuman effort from the cover fielder to pull it back in. Once again, too short from Umesh. He just punched that away, nice, high elbow when he made contact
drifting into the pads to make this a juicy half-volley, flicked into the deep backward square leg region
floats this full on middle, whipped to midwicket
tails in a full delivery on the pads, squeezed to Dinesh Karthik at mid-on
touch short on middle and leg, helped towards the long boundary at deep fine leg
this one jags back in off the deck from length outside off, waited for it to slide in as he tucked it to fine leg
slants a length ball into the stumps from wide of the crease, worked towards fine leg again
much fuller in length outside off, this one jags back in and he lets it go. Good technique, aware of his off stump

swung back in late. This was full and came back in a long way. Hope up to the task as he flicks this uppishly over square leg. Nearly fell over. Would've been plumb had he missed that. If I were Shami, I wouldn't mind this too much
wrong line. Length ball veering into the middle and leg, tucked to fine leg
short of length on off, this one skids through, Hope gets on top of the bounce and defends
slants a length ball into the pads, flicked straight to Jadhav at midwicket
much straighter and just around length on off stump, defended to the fielder coming in from mid-on
wristy flick into the square leg boundary. Drifting into the pads, Hope in complete control as he put that away without much fuss
banged in short at 138kph, doesn't rise as much as Umesh would've liked, turned to the leg side off the backfoot
short of length outside off, steered to Jadeja at backward point
slides a length ball into the stumps, worked to square leg
nips away late to square him up. ,Much fuller in length as well. Leading edge rolls to the off side
hops back and punches the short of length delivery to point

sloppy from DK at fine leg, but it doesn't cost him the run. Too short and sliding down, this was powerfully hit to fine leg. Bounced just in front of him. Tried stopping it like how a keeper would look to stop one on the bounce.
bunts a length ball outside off to Jadeja at point
picks the length early, punched away but straight to Jadhav at cover point
length and just outside off, punched to mid-off

what a tame dismissal. Looking to hit this length ball over mid-off but there's no power behind that whatsoever. Got it off the top part of the bat as it lobbed to Kohli. As easy as they come. Lewis has wasted an opportunity on a batting belter.
floats this full on off from wide of the crease, solidly defended
nearly chopped on! Poking at a length delivery outside the line, gets a thick inside-edge onto the pad

this was a harmless shot till the direct hit. Just hopped back to work it to square leg. Excellent awareness from Jadhav, who fired the throw. Shai Hope just manages to survive as he plonked his bat in a second before the ball hit the stumps
touch ahead of length outside off, defended back to the bowler
peach of a delivery. Gets this to hold its line, excellent seam presentation. He feels for the ball but it nibbles away just a wee bit to beat the outside edge
short of length delivery that jags back in from outside off, left alone
back of length delivery outside off, not much deviation off the deck, left alone
dabbed wide of Dhawan at slip as they scamper across for a single
cracking stroke! Picked the length early and forced this into the gap between cover and point. Off the backfoot. Crunching sound as bat met ball
this is a juicy half-volley, Kyle Hope presents the full face of the bat as he plays this bullet drive past mid-off. Delightful
snorter. Plenty of effort. Speed gun just clocks 134kph but it troubled him. Good technique by Shai, who drops his gloves and ways out of the way
Jadhav once again a little slow to come in from deep square leg. This was no more than a gentle whip towards the leg side. Excellent running. The throw was a touch wayward too.
right back and across as he bunts this back down the pitch
opens the bat face to steer this length ball to point
skiddy bouncer outside off, Shai Hope ducks under that. Dharmasena signals one bouncer for the over. Way over the head, but Pandya didn't like the call of th square leg umpire
worked off his hip to deep fine leg. Rocket throw from Shami
floats this much fuller and just outside off, left alone
defends the length ball on off to cover
both feet in the air as he whips this off his hip to deep square leg
nips back in a long way to shave past the inside edge. Once again, the batsman was camping back in anticipation of the short ball.
gets a good stride forward to defend that good length delivery to cover
gets on top of the bounce and fends the short of length delivery to Jadeja at point
floats this full on off stump, defended back down the pitch
crunching cover drive. Too full and he was ready. Bisected cover and mid-off. No one moved
gets this short of length delivery to stop on him, steered awkwardly to the off side
keeps a touch low, Shai was on the hop as he defended this to short midwicket
floated full and just outside off, inviting the drive, but Shai leaves this be
short ball on middle, he ducks under it quite comfortably
another skiddy bouncer but this was way over the batsman's head. Right call from the umpire
solidly defended to the off side off the backfoot
first ball at 140 clicks today. This one's angled in at length on off stump, defended solidly
beauty! This left him late to beat the outside edge. Looked to punch this on the up.
gets this to lift off the deck, he sways out of the way.
gentle little dab down to third man
driven through the line but straight to mid-off
wrong line. Short and sliding down leg, he looked to use the pace and help it to fine leg but missed. Correct call though from the umpire
right back into the crease as he defends the length ball to the off side
spins away from middle, defends from the crease
beats short fine leg. Too full and flat down leg, just helped it along. Lovely little sweep
driven with the spin to long-off as they jog the single
lunges forward and defends the in-drifter to cover
fired in one on the stumps from wide of the crease, defended off an inside-edge
angling into middle and leg, eased to long-on as they jog the single
floats this full on middle, firmly driven to mid-on
muscled past mid-off. Lots of bottom hand. By no means a half-volley but he'd decided to give this a whack anyway.
pulled imperiously in front of square. One bounce into the midwicket boundary. Fetched it from outside off. Umesh's having a shocker today
drifts in a length ball on middle, turned to midwicket

picks out Dhawan at midwicket. This wasn't all that short, he'd premeditated the pull, went through with it off the frontfoot and hit it straight into the hands of him there. Start wasted. Not the kind of delivery that deserved a wicket but Umesh will take it.

and he's gone first ball! Unless his review overturns Leslie Reifer's on-field verdict. Full and straight right up, with a little bit of late inswing. He plays across the line, around his front pad. Ball is full enough to sneak under his bat. Impact around middle and leg, and he barely took a stride forward, so it's no surprise that ball-tracking says it's crashing into a good chunk of leg stump
tossed up outside off, stretches out to push into the covers
full on middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
tossed up slower on a similar line, gets his front pad out of the way and squeezes it out into the point region
flatter, on off stump, defended to the left of short cover
full on off stump, defended to backward point
tossed up, angling into the pads, driven towards long-on
it's a relatively harmless bouncer, angling over leg stump. Ducks under nicely
shortish outside off, gets a good amount of bounce, jumps to ride the bounce and defend into the point region
short again, but loads of width this time, really lashes his bat through that cut, slaps it away to the right of backward point
fuller now, angling into off stump, defended back to the bowler
bouncer over middle and off, Hope ducks hurriedly
short, rising ball in the corridor, gets off his feet to ride the bounce and defend with soft hands towards backward point
slow, slightly back of a length on middle stump, goes back to tuck it carefully to midwicket
tossed up fuller, floated across towards off stump, stretches out to defend
short, rocks back, makes some room, and slaps to sweeper cover
tossed up on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
good ball, dips on the batsman on a middle-and-leg line as he comes forward and looks to work it leg side. Goes a little finer than he'd like, but wide of that man at leg slip
googly now, pitches outside leg and so the line slightly gives it away. Goes back to defend into the leg side
nice length on off stump, draws him forward and makes him adjust for some turn away from off stump. Defended with an open face into the covers
a little quicker, goes back and defends into the point region
tossed up slower on middle stump, gets his front leg out of the way and drives to long-off
sometimes you wonder if Jadeja knows the lbw law. This goes with the angle, is clearly sliding down leg. Passes the inside edge as he tries to work it leg side
similar delivery to the previous one, clipped towards midwicket
a bit of flight on off stump, defended into the covers
tossed up slow on middle and off, gets some turn in. Defended back towards the bowler
fuller, on off stump, defended into the covers
flighted ball on off and middle, driven back towards the bowler
field change gets in the batsman's mind. Goes on the back foot almost premeditatedly to a length ball, plays all around it, but it's spinning down leg, so the lbw appeal is muted
floated up slower and wider, defended into the point region
nice flight on off stump. Comes forward and doesn't quite reach the pitch, so he brings his wrists into play for a bottom-handed drive towards mid-off
oh my. That's a Jadeja special. Draws Mohammed forward with some flight and beats his defensive bat with sharp turn. Doesn't miss off stump by much
fuller, straighter, blocked back to the bowler
dangled up on off stump, stretches out and defends into the on side
full on middle stump, gets his front pad out of the way and shows the full face for a push to long-off
fullish, angled into leg stump, clipped to the right of midwicket
another lbw appeal to a ball sliding down the leg side. Stretched out, didn't get close to the pitch in defence, and the ball slid past the inside edge
goes back to a slow length ball pitching on off and turning back in, works it away through square leg
floated up outside off, gets a good stride out for a push into the point region
full on middle stump, driven to long-off
a touch short on off stump, makes room to slap towards sweeper cover
flighted ball on leg stump, driven to long-on

ooh, good ball. Only half-forward in defence, and dip and turn cause him to inside-edge thickly. Flies to the left of the diving short leg fielder. On second look, it's not gone that quickly, and not that far to the fielder's left. Just eludes his left hand.
floated up on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
flat length ball on off stump, goes back to defend into the covers
back of a length now, goes on the back foot and punches into the covers
fuller, angling into middle and leg, makes sure his front pad is out of the way while defending to the left of the bowler
takes the inside-out approach to a bit of an extreme. This one's angling in towards leg stump and he drives to sweeper cover

flighted on off stump, a touch too full, driven to the left of long-off. We have a run-out appeal here. Umesh, firstly, does very well to sprint around, stop with his boot, and throw at the far end, the keeper's end. Wow, what seemed like a comfortable two ends up as a very tight one for Mohammed, who just beats Dhoni clipping the bails off with a desperate dive
tossed up on off stump, looks for the whippy drive to long-on but Kuldeep dives right to cut it off
slow length ball on middle stump, slow enough for Hope to go deep in his crease and work it through square leg
floated up too full on off stump, driven to the right of sweeper cover and Rahane makes a good tumbling stop at the boundary
tossed up on middle and leg. Stretches out to defend but the ball dips shorter than he expects. Squeezes out into the leg side off the inside half
nice flight outside off, gets him to stretch forward and across and defend into the point region
flat length ball on middle stump, stays on the back foot to defend into the covers
fuller now, comes forward for a defensive push towards long-off. Jadeja himself does the chasing
fired in flat and fullish on middle and off, defended towards short extra-cover
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
fuller, slightly outside off, driven to sweeper cover
a bit of flight on off stump, presses forward for a push into the covers
back of a length, turning down leg, goes back and whips through square leg
nicely bowled, dangled up enticingly on middle stump. Again he's not quite to the pitch, beaten by a bit of dip, and he drags his drive to long-on off the inside half of the bat
tossed up on off stump, gets his head right over the ball to drive to long-off
dips onto a good length on off stump, presses forward and blocks
full on leg stump, looks for the clip into the square leg region but short leg dives right to intercept
a touch short on leg stump, goes back and works it through square leg
tossed up just outside off, driven through point
fired in flat on off stump, goes back to defend into the covers
a bit slower, fuller, straighter, defended inside-out into the covers
flatter, angling into off stump, just enough turn to deny him the whip through midwicket. Has to play it back to the bowler
brings him forward now, with flight on off stump, driven back towards the bowler

an excellent over, spoiled a little by some dozy fielding at midwicket. Goes back to this length ball on middle, clips it to midwicket. Didn't really hit it hard, the fielder charged in, swooped, took his eye off the ball momentarily and it slipped through his fingers. Jadhav the fielder.
floated up slow on middle stump. His arm came from just in front of the umpire. Defended off the front foot
tossed up on leg stump, defended to midwicket
a touch short, just outside off, and that's a superb shot. Jumps back in an instant and slaps it to the left of cover point, who had just come into the ring to permit long-off to drop back
slow length ball turning down leg. Plays down the wrong line, looking to flick, and it hits his pad
tossed up outside off, defended into the covers
flat length ball on off stump, defended to short extra
fired into the pads, clipped to midwicket
flat, round-arm, angled into middle and leg. Goes back to defend back to the bowler
fuller and slower on middle stump, defended inside-out to short extra
tossed up on off stump, driven to short extra-cover
full on middle and off, jabbed back to the bowler
oh my. That is sooooo slooooooooooooooooooow. Slightly back of a length, slightly outside off. Goes back to slap it through the covers, and is beaten by lack of turn and some gentle away drift
goes back to a length ball that keeps low on middle stump, clips to midwicket

gone! Kedar Jadhav keeps getting wickets with utter filth, because sometimes utter filth is utterly difficult to combat. This is a shortish ball, not a long-hop, just short enough to provoke the batsman to rock back and look to slap it away into the covers. But it's on off stump, it doesn't give him that much room, and it sticks on the pitch a little. Result, a dolly of a return catch, slapped straight back at waist height
length ball turning in slightly towards middle stump, punched to midwicket with a straight bat
on leg stump now, clipped to the right of midwicket, who moves quickly to stop it
flat, angling into middle stump, defended back to the bowler
tossed up on off stump, driven to long-off
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
flat, round-arm, angling into middle and off. Comes forward and clips to midwicket. Played slightly around his front pad there
oh, well bowled. Dangled up slower and he looks to clear his front leg and slap through the covers. Goes with the arm and he inside-edges into his legs
goes on the back foot now to one angled into him, tucks it to square leg
on the pads, whipped to midwicket
round-arm, floated up at the pads, clipped to square leg
back of a length on off stump, and he punches down to long-on
floated up slow, outside leg, misses the sweep

oh, nearly another wicket! Dropped. A bit of drift away from off stump and he ends up playing inside the line in defence. Big deflection off the outside edge, hard for Dhoni to catch that. Hit the edge of his glove and popped out
a touch short, goes back to work it through square leg
back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
flat, back of a length, on off and middle, goes back to defend back down the pitch
fired in flat, fuller, angling into middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
replay of the previous ball, defended firmly back to Jadeja
a rare long-hop, and Holder clears his front leg and swats it away over midwicket
length ball wide of off, slapped to deep point
length ball on off stump, defended into the covers
goes back to a slow length ball on off stump, punches to long-off
length ball on leg stump, a bit of late curl away, punched to long-on
back of a length on leg stump, goes back to work to deep square leg
full on the pads, clipped to midwicket
length ball on leg stump, clipped to the right of midwicket
length ball close to off stump, a bit of away-drift. Punched to long-off
back of a length, wide of off, left alone
ooh, nasty bouncer. Gets up to an awkward height around Hope's left shoulder as looks to hook. Cramps him for room, and he gloves it to the left of Dhoni
short ball on off stump, jumps to ride the bounce and defend with soft hands
bouncer outside off, left alone
length ball angling into off stump, goes back and works it through square leg
length ball close to off stump, defended to short extra-cover
punches the short delivery to long-on
goes a long way across to defend the full delivery on the stumps, lucky he got some bat on it
bottom-edges a reverse paddle past Dhoni. Looked to hit it a lot squarer. Through Dhoni's pads
takes it on the full. Gave away his intent very early. Reverse swept past point. Enough bat on that. Holder used his reach to good effect
yes, no, yes, no. Jadeja came haring in from point, but couldn't collect it cleanly before firing the throw. Holder just tapped it there and took off for the run. Hope was struggling
hops back and punches this back to the bowler
skiddy bouncer on middle, Holder takes him on with the hook shot but played too early. Ball buzzed over his helmet
connected that superbly! Waltzed down the pitch and muscled this off the frontfoot over deep midwicket. Pandya rolled his fingers over the delivery, fetched from outside off
much fuller and just outside off, squeezed to mid-off as they scamper a quick single
off-cutter just outside off stump, he lunges forward and blocks.

slower length ball on middle, whipped to deep square leg. Second half-century of the series for Hope. Third of his career. Tad slow but has held the innings. Now for him to bat through and finish this off, get West Indies closer to 240, perhaps?
uses the pace to steer this down to square third man
spins back in a long way to hit thigh pad as he looks to work it wide of square leg
quicker delivery that pitched outside leg. Once again beaten by the fizz of the delivery. Hit high on the thigh pad
picked the bones out of this reverse sweep. Hit sweetly behind point. Not sure he read the spin of that delivery, went through anyway. This was the googly
too full and just outside off, lunges forward and smothers the spin
driven firmly to wide long-off. Too much flight that time
drifts in from wide of the crease, defended back to Kuldeep
late reverse back in from outside off, solidly defended
steered away towards square third man where Karthik dished in a dive to cut it off. Kept going away from him. Used the pace to lend direction. Sweet timing
this is terrific. Cover was in, this was full and so he made room and blasted this over the infield. Excellent. The intent is so good to see from the captain
flicked straight to Kuldeep at square leg. He fires the throw almost immediately. No chance of a single. Good backing up

muscles this to Dhawan, who takes an excellent catch running to his left at long-on. This was travelling but he anticipated it and moved quickly to make it look ridiculously easy. Holder overambitious on that occasion and has paid the price for it.
looked to bowl a yorker, turns out to be a high full toss, eased back to the bowler as they scamper a quick single
drifts one away from the right-hander, defended with an angled bat
edged and this races past short third man. Didn't pick the googly. The ball drifted away to take the outside edge
defended back to the bowler off the backfoot. Another wrong'un
keeps a touch low, Powell played back to a delivery he should've gone forward, off the inside-edge back to the bowler
slides across the face of the bat. This one drifted away. Dhoni whips the bails off
lunges forward and defends this to the off side
bunted down to long-on as they complete an easy single
mistimes an attempted pull, off the toe-end to deep square leg
digs in a short ball outside off, he was walking across to play but eventually ducked under it

this is outstanding from Rahane. Catch of the series. He took on the length ball to pull, skewed it high in the air towards deep midwicket. Rahane, at deep square, was coming in. He called for it, came in and realised the ball was swirling away, but kept his eyes on the ball and dived full-length to his left to pluck that just before it touched the ground. Terrific
sways out of the way of the short ball outside off
drilled down to long-on. This tailed back in late, he presented the full face of the bat
beaten by the wrong'un again. The ball drifted away to miss the edge as he shaped to drive.
leading edge, rolls to cover. Looked to work this with the spin but realised the ball spun the other way again
hits a crack and jumps on him, hit high on the thigh pad
touch short, sitting up nicely for him as he steers this to deep point
lunges a long way forward to smother the spin but the ball comes back in a long way to beat the inside edge and hit him on the pad
reads the googly off the hand and lunges forward to defend
eases the full ball to the man at the edge of the ring at cover
knuckle ball, maybe? Stopped on him as he arched back to steer this behind square. Missed it completely. On the bounce to Dhoni

another soft dismissal. Chipped straight to short midwicket. The delivery slanted back in from wide of the crease, he looked to go over mid-on perhaps and got a thick inside edge. Shami has looked in excellent rhythm all day
looks to help this over point but is late on the shot.
plants forward and gently defends the full delivery to the off side
bouncer on middle at 138kph. He sways out of the way comfortable as the ball buzzes past his helmet
touch short on middle and leg, punched into the gap between deep square and deep midwicket
thick inside edge towards short fine leg. Pushed outside the line of one that drifted away and then spun back in
dropped! By Dhoni's standards, that's as simple as they come. Sharp turn, he bobbled it on the second attempt.
full toss, hit back past Kuldeep as they take a quick single
thick edge to short third man. Didn't pick the googly
goes back into the crease and defends the tossed up delivery to the off side
play and a miss. Too early into the drive
full ball that tails away from middle, squeezed to cover
superb effort by Jadeja at backward point. Firm push, the ball kept going away from him but he took a couple of steps before diving full-stretch as compared to many who would've just looked to dive.
backs away to hit this on the up over cover but is beaten as the ball nips away late
shapes to pull but is in no position as he's cramped for room. Skews it back to the bowler, nearly.
looked to smash this into the mountains, near Henry Gayle's house. Couldn't connect. Feet west, bat north, head looking away.
eases the slower length ball to extra cover
superb short ball directed towards the body. Somehow managed to get out of the way. Whizzed through to Dhoni
slower and fuller outside off, he opened the bat face just a little to steer it behind point but got a thick edge that beat third man. Won't complain how the runs come at this stage
thick inside-edge onto the pad, rolls to point as they scamper a single
short-arm jab to deep midwicket
backs away to try and ramp this over Dhoni's head but this didn't bounce as much as it should have, ends up feathering an edge to Dhoni
looks to hoick this over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge down to deep backward square leg
gets the direction of the slower ball horribly wrong. Slips out of his hand and it's way outside off. Rolls to Dhoni
right into the blockhole, squeezed to long-on
no feet movement. Just hands coming through to drive on the up. The ball moved away just a wee bit to miss the outside edge
skiddy short ball that raps him on the glove, rolls towards midwicket
beaten for pace, goes through with the pull and gets it high on the bat. Plonks in no man's land. Rahane had no chance coming in from deep midwicket
edged to third man. Rising short ball, he tried to get out of the way but hung his bat out
slower ball that beats the outside edge as he pushed inside the line.
gloves a short ball on the body towards fine leg
looks to pull but is beaten for pace. Too late. Swung through blindly
clears his front leg, picks the length ball and muscles this over long-on. That was hit towards the biggest boundary. Wow. Picked the change in pace nicely
beaten for pace, again another quick bouncer touching 140kph. Looked to fetch the pull from outside off
mistimes a pull straight to deep midwicke
clobbered over long-on. Too full, right in the slot and Powell was waiting deep inside the crease to manufacture the length. Once Umesh missed the yorker by a long way, this was right down his alley
backs away to carve this over point, Umesh fires this wide. Lets it go. Expected this to be called wide but this was just inside the line
swung away towards deep midwicket where a misfield by Rahane gives them a second
Pure pace. This is the short ball angling into the body, he looks to pull but the ball gets big on him and gloves it down leg to Dhoni. Handy knock
caught in a tangle, tied into knots as he looks to pull. Lobs off the toe-end of the bat. Jadeja comes in all the way from point to catch, and ends up running across to square leg. What speed
sees the batsman trying to make room and fires this wide outside off, he can't reach it.
back of a length outside off, left alone

ooh, good ball.  Back of a length, angling in from wide of the crease and getting some extra bounce. Jumps to ride the bounce and defend, and it hits the inside half of the bat, high up, bounces by his feet, and nearly rolls back towards the stumps
back of a length outside off, steered towards third man
shortish, slanting away and offering width, and Dhawan loves that, just slashes it away, deliberately up and over backward point
fuller now, slanting away in the channel outside off, left alone

gone! That's well bowled by Joseph, fullish outside off, but well short of driving length. Dhawan doesn't go for the full-blooded on-the-up drive. He holds himself back, perhaps realising too late that he's not to the pitch of the ball, and checks his shot, and only succeeds in spooning a simple catch to short cover
length ball close to off stump, comes forward to defend, hits the inside half of the bat and rolls into the on side
shortish, fairly wide, steered to third man
back of a length, angling into Kohli's body as he takes that big shuffle across his stumps. Defended towards midwicket
ooh, lots of bounce from just short of a good length, but starts wide of off stump and Kohli leaves comfortably
back of a length for now, angling into off stump. Shuffles across and tucks it through square leg
back of a length, straightens a touch in the corridor, jumps back and across and defends into the covers
shortish, angling into Rahane's body with a good amount of lift. Drops his wrists and lets it hit his thigh pad
shortish in the corridor, and Rahane dabs towards that wide slip/gully fielder. May have moved a little wider to cut off Rahane's favourite steer down to third man
length ball on off stump, defended into the covers
back of a length outside off, steers it wide of gully to the fielder at third man
back of a length, angling into off stump, punched to mid-on
length ball on off and middle, clipped to midwicket
shot! That's a good-length ball angling into middle and off and Rahane clips it wide of midwicket

dropped, but a tough chance. Short and wide and Rahane slaps it hard. Bishoo, diving left from cover point, gets both hands to it but can't old on. On second glance, it's not as difficult as I thought. Didn't have to move that far to his left
shortish in the corridor, left alone
once again, hits the deck hard in the corridor. Kohli steps across and leaves
bouncer over middle stump, Kohli ducks.
length ball angling into off stump, positive stride forward to defend to mid-on
back of a length close to off stump, punched into the point region
brilliant, and not a typical Rahane shot at all. More like the guy at the other end, actually. Length ball outside off, and he steps forward and across and whips this wide of mid-on
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to gully
back of a length outside off, opens his bat face to place this to the left of the diving backward point fielder
bouncer outside off, Kohli sways away from the line
shot. Short outside off, gets right on top of it to punch between backward point and cover point
full, angling into middle and leg, and that's beautifully played, lovely late contact and turn of the wrists, with head right over the ball, to glance it fine and easily beat fine leg to his right
back of a length outside off, stabbed to backward point with an open face
good ball, a bit of away seam movement from a good length in the corridor. Rahane looks to drive without really getting forward and across, and the ball easily beats his outside edge
shot, he's really turning it on here. Not a half-volley, but plenty of width, and he opens his bat face and drives to the left of cover point
length ball, angling down leg. Rahane misses the flick and it hits his thigh pad

brilliant. Shortish, angling into off stump. That isn't a square-cut ball, but square-cut he does. Just leans his upper body away from the line to create a bit of room, and slaps it on top of the bounce to send it racing away between backward point and cover point

full, close to off stump, and that big Kohli stride is timed just right. Gets his weight moving into the ball, and he simply shows the full face to punch it back past the bowler, who can't bend low enough, quickly enough in his follow-through to stop it
responds with a short, rising ball close to off stump. Rides the bounce and chops it down towards backward point
back of a length on off stump, defended to midwicket

shot. This was just a touch short, on off stump. Not an attempted bouncer, just one where he's dragged his length a little too far back, and Kohli swivels on his back foot to pull that through square leg
back of a length on off stump, steps a long way across to tuck it to the left of long leg. He can hit a ball on that line anywhere between mid-on and deep backward square leg
slower length ball outside off, presses forward to defend into the off side
length ball close to off stump, defended into the covers

ooh, that's a good ball. That's banged in short, and it gets up to shoulder height along a fifth-stump line. That big movement across the stumps causes Kohli to jab at it, and he manages to keep it down, just about, in front of fielder diving to his right at gully
short outside off, shapes to pull but decides to leave in the end
length ball on middle stump, tucked away to long leg
back of a length, fifth-stump line, left alone
length ball angling in towards off stump. Looks to defend back towards the bowler, and it runs away through square leg off the inside half of the bat
back of a length outside off, left alone. A bit of inswing, but starts wide enough to not worry Kohli
shifts his line wider, easier leave

fullish outside off, not a half-volley but Kohli's long stride gets him close to the pitch and he punches with a straight bat towards mid-off, who only manages to deflect the ball with one hand while sliding to his left
shortish, angling into off stump, gets off his toes to defend
bam. Short, just outside off, and Kohli steps across and pulls with a degree of violence to the right of midwicket
back of a length, angling into leg stump, glanced to the right of long leg
shortish on off stump, rises onto his toes to defend back to the bowler
length ball outside off, left alone
shortish outside off, defended to backward point
back of a length, close to off stump, defended back towards the bowler
back of a length, fifth-stump line, defended to short cover
length ball angling into off stump, presses forward and defends to short cover
ooh, keeps a little low. Makes room to cut and it sneaks under his bat
tossed up on off stump, driven back to the bowler
back of a length, sliding on towards off stump, no turn, goes back and punches it back to the bowler
shortish, a bit of width, punched to cover
shortish outside off, waits a little longer to slap to deep point
back of a length outside off, waits on it and stabs to backward point
back of a length, fourth-stump line. Lets it come on and guides it down to third man
shortish, close to off stump, takes his bottom hand off while defending to the left of short extra-cover, and just a glance to the non-striker is enough for the batsmen to scurry a quick single
back of a length on off stump, uses his wrists at the top of the bounce to play that to the right of mid-on
back of a length on off stump, worked away to the left of long leg
shortish outside off, opens his bat face and stabs it to the right of third man
back of a length close to off stump, punched towards mid-on
back of a length on off stump, punched to cover
full outside off, driven hard but straight to short extra-cover
back of a length outside off, jumps back and across and punches with a straight bat to long-on
floated up full on middle stump, clipped quietly into the square leg region
fullish on middle stump, clipped to midwicket
tossed up wide of off, just throws his hands at the drive and it streaks away off the outside half of the bat, to the left of backward point
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, lets it come on and punches to deep point
full, angling into leg stump, clipped to long leg. Throw from Joseph clears the leaping keeper, and they run an overthrow
short outside off, snatches too eagerly at it and slaps it straighter than he'd like. Nurse dives right at short cover to stop it
back of a length outside off, guided down to third man
short outside off, punched firmly but straight to cover
length ball on off stump, defended to mid-on
back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on, dabs it late, and slip, diving right, deflects it towards backward point
length ball outside off, presses forward and dabs into the point region
flighted ball on middle and leg, good stride forward to defend
tossed up outside off, Kohli comes forward for a checked drive to cover
tossed up wide of off, driven with that bottom-hand whip to the left of cover
short, wide, slapped to deep point
back of a length, angling into leg stump, clipped away to the left of long leg
shortish, fifth-stump line, steered down to third man
bouncer outside off, left alone
short, a bit of width, slapped away to deep point
back of a length on off stump, defended to mid-on
slower and fuller, clipped to midwicket
ooh, that's fortunate. Down the track, goes for the big slog from outside off. Doesn't turn, and he ends up inside-edging it past leg stump and past the keeper
quicker and flatter, clipped to midwicket
tossed up wide of off, driven to deep point
back of a length on off stump, punched to long-on
tossed up outside off, driven to long-off
back of a length outside off, dabbed down to short third man
full, angles into the pads, and Kohli puts it away easily, lets it come on and clips it away to the fine leg boundary. Long leg is far too wide to be able to stop it
length ball on off stump, clipped to midwicket
slower ball outside off, reaches away from his body to punch to cover point
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, gets across his stumps to work it to midwicket
slower ball, full and wide, stretches out to defend to short cover
shortish outside off, meets it at the top of the bounce to stab to the right of backward point, who makes a good diving stop
tossed up on middle, eased back to the bowler
drifting into the pads, Rahane hit on the thigh pad as he looks to turn this with the angle
fired into the stumps from wide of the crease, nurdled to square leg
looks to flay this away through cover, this kept low to beat the bottom-edge

plumb in front. He's played all around a straight one. For a moment, he was pondering a review but Kohli told him in no uncertain terms that the ball would've crashed into the stumps. This was angled in full from wide of the crease, Rahane was better off playing straight. Instead looked to work it wide of midwicket. Error in judgment.
loose delivery. Too short, he rocks back and cracks this away behind point
gentle half-volley on the pads, flicked straight to midwicket
tremendous use of the bottom hand. Slower and fuller outside off, Kohli whips this away over the infield, one bounce into the wide long-on boundary.
slants this into the pads, wrists this into the gap at deep backward square leg. Slow outfield means they'll have to do plenty of running
floats a length ball on middle from wide of the crease, defended to the leg side
caresses a full-length delivery to extra cover
opens the face of the bat to steer this between cover and point
slaps this into the cover boundary. Too short, he rocked back and picked that away without much fuss.
cut away but straight to point this time.
thumped towards sweeper cover. Too short from Bishoo
crunching drive but straight to the man at the edge of the ring
forced off the backfoot but straight to cover again
thick outside edge but a tumbling stop by Holder at short third man
uses the width to steer the short ball to short third man
worked into the gap between short fine leg and deep square leg. 100 up for India
too much flight, he gets to the pitch of the ball and drives hard to deep extra cover
lunges forward before bringing his wrists into play to work that to deep midwicket
drifting into middle and leg, turned behind square as they jog the single
drilled into the deep extra cover boundary. Rank half-volley and Kohli was up to the task. 44th ODI fifty for him, 10th against West Indies
drifts in a full ball on the stumps from wide of the crease, DK lunges forward and smothers the spin
works a full ball down to long-on
fired into the pads, whipped to deep square leg
punched wide of cover as they scamper a quick single
too full, didn't get underneath the flight, squeezed back to the bowler. Lets out a cry of anguish
'hit me' written all over it. Long hop outside off, Kohli rocks back, opens up the leg side and muscles this over deep midwicket. Too easy for him
superb footwork to get to the pitch of the ball and then blast that inside-out into the cover boundary. Positive intent right from the word go, so good to see
steps out and whips this from outside off towards long-on
worked with the spin to Holder at square leg
worked back to the bowler, who dives to his right on the followthrough to stop the single
flatter one on middle, punched past short midwicket as they jog the single
nicely tossed up, Karthik check-drives to cover
punches the short of length delivery to deep point
bunts this down to third man
rip roaring bouncer. Kohli looks to hook but pulls out of it as it got big on him
strong wrists to the fore again as he whips this from offstump to midwicket
punched to the fielder coming in from deep cover
shows the full face of the bat in defence
too much flight, driven towards wide long-off. Kohli wanted the second, Karthik wasn't keen
rocks back and cuts this towards deep point where Chase cuts it off
lunges forward and turns this with the spin to the leg side
punched past the diving Nurse to long-on
fired into the stumps from wide of the crease, whipped to midwicket
so clever. Uses the pace of the bowler to open the bat face late and glide this past short third man
slants in a full ball on the stumps from wide of the crease, defended back to the bowler

slashed away into the square third man boundary. Kesrick Williams dived over the ball and landed on his shoulder. He's clutching it, but doesn't seem to be in too much discomfort. Joseh wasn't impressed with the effort. Well, it was a poor ball for starters
driven through the line to wide mid-off. Confident push from Karthik
works the incoming length ball wide of mid-on
uses the pace to dab this gently to third man
beaten as he attempts to punch that. The ball nipped back in and kept a touch low as well. Hope is hit on the shin as he looks to stop that. Got an awkward bounce
carved away into the cover boundary. Too full on middle, Kohli made some room and brought out those wrists. Opened them up nicely to generate power. Drilled. The boundary rider stood no chance
short on middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
beaten by one that drifts away from the stumps. Played for turn when there was none
chops it between the keeper's legs. Shaped to cut but didn't have the room
eased wide of cover as they jog the single

beautiful cut shot. There's point, there's short third man but Karthik still managed to bisect them. Lovely. The trick to it was to play really late and he did that to perfection. Not enough width to play a full-blooded stroke but he still manufactured it
driven straight to cover
this is a gift. Waist-high full toss outside off, swung away into the long-on boundary
mistimes a cut to point. This one kept a touch low
punched to long-on
keeps a touch low but Karthik makes room and still cuts this to sweeper cover
forced away off the backfoot to deep cover again
back of length delivery outside off, punched to point
angles a length ball into the pads, worked to deep fine leg
walks down the pitch to whip this, gets a thick inside edge onto the pad. Just short of the fielder coming in from midwicket
wants a single but is sent back. Midwicket fielder swooped in quickly
bottom-edges a pull, on the bounce to the keeper. Played too early
slower and fuller on the stumps, driven to point
angles a slower ball on off stump, the length is on the fuller side, Kohli gently defends
thick inside edge that beats the keeper, who was going the wrong side. He was moving to his right and had to suddenly change directions. Two handy runs
punched on the up. Kept speeding away from Holder, who just about managed to retrieve this back before it crossed the ropes
hit back hard, smashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end
slapped into the cover boundary. Short alright, but he generated the power by getting on top of the bounce and then muscling this away. Bottom hand to the fore again.
gentle little dab to the off side as they scamper a single
forced off the backfoot, thick edge to square third man
floats this full and just outside off, Karthik is well forward as he defends
gets on top of the bounce and nurdles this wide of the wicketkeeper, on the leg side
hammered into the gap. Fetched the pull from outside off. Deep square had to run around towards where deep midwicket would be to cut that off
gets out of the way of the short ball. Dug in short and he watched this through to the keeper
bunts this to short third man, wanted a run but turned down by Karthik
slips in a yorker from wide of the crease, squeezed back towards the bowler
advances down the track and drills the slower delivery back to the bowler
slower and fuller outside off, Karthik finds mid-off. Briefly held his shape to go over the top
mistimes a drive, uppish but just shot of mid-off
steers a full-length delivery to backward point
angles a length ball into the pads, tickled to fine leg
floated full on the pads, worked towards deep backward square leg
looks to whip this wide of midwicket, squeezes it to mid-on. Didn't entirely get outside the line of the ball
swivels back and pulls this all along the ground to deep square leg
picks the gap. Didn't quite time the pull but bisected midwicket and mid-on
direction of the slower delivery is horribly wrong, way down leg
stands tall and punches the short of length delivery to backward point
this is a juicy half-volley on middle, he flicks this into the gap at midwicket. Delightful timing.
length ball close to off stump, blocked into the cover region
length ball wide of off, leans forward and plays a straight-bat punch that is well stopped by short extra-cover diving to his right

ooh, good ball. Goes wider of the crease and angles into off stump. Kohli wants to punch into the covers, gets a thick inside edge that runs away through square leg. Kohli wants two right from the start, Karthik is a little slow to respond. He just about makes it at the bowler's end before the bails go off

a lovely way to bring up his 28th ODI hundred. A bit of a gift from Williams, overpitched on middle stump, and he simply leans into the ball and clips it between mid-on and midwicket. Big, angry roar after he takes off his helmet, as always
length ball angling into the pads, clipped to the right of deep square leg
full outside off, driven back firmly, straight back to the bowler
full on middle stump, shows the full face to push to long-on
length ball close to off stump, gets forward and opens his bat face to dab to backward point
a skip down the track, Powell shortens his length slightly outside off, opens his bat face and steers towards backward point
fullish, on the pads, clipped to deep square leg
fullish on middle and off, clipped away cleverly - fine leg was inside the circle and deep square leg was in front of square, and he put it into the wide expanse between them
full on off stump, defended towards straight midwicket
tossed up slow outside off, comes onto the front foot and clips to long-on
a touch short, punched away through point
back of a length outside off, lets it come on and steers to the left of short third man to bring up his eighth ODI fifty
flicked to midwicket
and that is that. Flighted ball on off stump, and Kohli brings his wrists to play, whipping it a long way over long-on
